fact_usage: On June 15, 2023, Sarah Johnson was physically assaulted by her husband, Michael Johnson.
The altercation began as a verbal argument over financial issues.
Michael grabbed Sarah's arm forcefully and pushed her against the wall.
The incident lasted approximately 20 minutes before Sarah was able to leave the house and seek help from a neighbor.
Officer Rodriguez responded to a 911 call at approximately 9:45 PM on the night of the incident.
